Headline: Senator Harry Truman Visits VFW Convention in Chicago
Caption-Abstract: Vice Presidential candidate Senator Harry S. Truman smiles as he talks to Veterans of Foreign Wars leaders before Truman's appearance at the VFW Conference in Chicago, IL. Left to right: commander-in-chief of the VFW Carl J. Schoeninger; Senator Truman; senior vice-commander-in-chief Jean Brunner; and past national commander Eugene I. Van Antwerp.

Headline: Senator Harry Truman Visits VFW Convention in Chicago
Caption-Abstract: Vice Presidential candidate Senator Harry S. Truman speaks to Veterans of Foreign Wars leaders before Truman's appearance at the VFW Conference in Chicago, IL. Left to right: commander-in-chief of the VFW Carl J. Schoeninger; Senator Truman; senior vice-commander-in-chief Jean Brunner; and past national commander Eugene I. Van Antwerp.

Headline: Newbold Morris Sworn In as Parks Commissioner of New York City
Caption-Abstract: New York City Mayor Robert F. Wagner (center) swears in Newbold Morris (left) as Parks Commissioner of New York City in the City Council Chamber. Seated in the rear are President of the New York City Council Paul R. Screvane (left) and New York City Comptroller Abraham Beame (right).
